verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G4407>morning<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G2289>put<s%> Him to <S%G2289>death;<s%>
and they <S%G1210>bound<s%> Him, and <S%G520>led<s%> Him <S%G520>away,<s%> and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him up to <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> the <S%G2232>governor.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> when <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> who had <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> Him, <S%G3708>saw<s%> that He had been <S%G2632>condemned,<s%> he <S%G3338>felt<s%> <S%G3338>remorse<s%> and <S%G4762>returned<s%> the <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G694>pieces<s%> of <S%G694>silver<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4245>elders,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I have <S%G264>sinned<s%> by <S%G3860>betraying<s%> <S%G121>innocent<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>" But they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> is that to us? <S%G3708>See<s%> [to that] <S%G4771>yourself!<s%>"

And he <S%G4496>threw<s%> the <S%G694>pieces<s%> of <S%G694>silver<s%> into the <S%G3485>sanctuary<s%> and <S%G402>departed;<s%> and he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G519>hanged<s%> himself.

And the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G694>pieces<s%> of <S%G694>silver<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "It is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G906>put<s%> them into the <S%G2878>temple<s%> <S%G2878>treasury,<s%> <S%G1893>since<s%> it is the <S%G5092>price<s%> of <S%G129>blood.<s%>"

And they <S%G4824>counseled<s%> <S%G2983><s%> <S%G4824>together<s%> and with the <S%G846>money<s%> <S%G59>bought<s%> the Potter's <S%G68>Field<s%> as a <S%G5027>burial<s%> <S%G5027>place<s%> for <S%G3581>strangers.<s%>
For <S%G1352>this<s%> <S%G1352>reason<s%> that <S%G68>field<s%> has been <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G68>Field<s%> of <S%G129>Blood<s%> to <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> that which was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2408>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "And they <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G694>pieces<s%> of <S%G694>silver,<s%> the <S%G5092>price<s%> of the one <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5091>price<s%> had been <S%G5091>set<s%> by the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel;<s%>
and they <S%G1325>gave<s%> them for the Potter's <S%G68>Field,<s%> as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4929>directed<s%> me. "

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G2232>governor,<s%> and the <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Are You the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?" And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, "[It is as] you <S%G3004>say.<s%>"
And <S%G1722>while<s%> He was being <S%G2723>accused<s%> by the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4245>elders,<s%> He <S%G611>made<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G611>answer.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Do You not <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G4214>things<s%> they <S%G2649>testify<s%> <S%G2649>against<s%> You?"

And He did not <S%G611>answer<s%> him with <S%G4314>regard<s%> to <S%G3761>even<s%> a [single] <S%G4487>charge,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G2232>governor<s%> was <S%G3029>quite<s%> <S%G2296>amazed.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> at [the] <S%G1859>feast<s%> the <S%G2232>governor<s%> was <S%G1486>accustomed<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> for the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> [any] <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G2309>wanted.<s%>
And they were <S%G2192>holding<s%> at that <S%G5119>time<s%> a <S%G1978>notorious<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner,<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas.<s%>

When <S%G3767>therefore<s%> they were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Whom<s%> do you <S%G2309>want<s%> me to <S%G630>release<s%> for you? <S%G912>Barabbas,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>?"
For he <S%G3609>knew<s%> that <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G5355>envy<s%> they had <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him up.

And while he was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> on the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat,<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Have <S%G3367>nothing<s%> to do with that <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>Man;<s%> for <S%G4594>last<s%> <S%G4594>night<s%> I <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G4183>greatly<s%> in a <S%G3677>dream<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of Him."

But the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> to <S%G154>ask<s%> for <S%G912>Barabbas,<s%> and to <S%G622>put<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G622>death.<s%>

But the <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Which<s%> of the <S%G1417>two<s%> do you <S%G2309>want<s%> me to <S%G630>release<s%> for you?" And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G912>"Barabbas.<s%>"

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3767>"Then<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>?" They <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Let Him be <S%G4717>crucified!<s%>"

And he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G1063>"Why,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> has He <S%G4160>done<s%>?" But they kept <S%G2896>shouting<s%> <S%G4057>all<s%> the <S%G4057>more,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Let Him be <S%G4717>crucified!<s%>"

And when <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> that he was <S%G5623>accomplishing<s%> <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> that a <S%G2351>riot<s%> was <S%G1096>starting,<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> and <S%G633>washed<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> in <S%G2713>front<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G121>innocent<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> Man's <S%G129>blood;<s%> <S%G3708>see<s%> [to that] <S%G4771>yourselves.<s%>"
And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "His <S%G129>blood<s%> [be] on us and on our <S%G5043>children!<s%>"
<S%G5119>Then<s%> he <S%G630>released<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> for them; but after having <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5417>scourged,<s%> he <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him to be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> of the <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> into the <S%G4232>Praetorium<s%> and <S%G4863>gathered<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> [Roman] <S%G4686>cohort<s%> <S%G1909>around<s%> Him.
And they <S%G1562>stripped<s%> Him, and <S%G4060>put<s%> a <S%G2847>scarlet<s%> <S%G5511>robe<s%> on Him.

And after <S%G4120>weaving<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G173>thorns,<s%> they <S%G2007>put<s%> it on His <S%G2776>head,<s%> and a <S%G2563>reed<s%> in His <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand;<s%> and they <S%G1120>kneeled<s%> <S%G1120>down<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> Him and <S%G1702>mocked<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5463>"Hail,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews!<s%>"
And they <S%G1716>spat<s%> on Him, and <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G2563>reed<s%> and [began] to <S%G5180>beat<s%> Him on the <S%G2776>head.<s%>

And <S%G3753>after<s%> they had <S%G1702>mocked<s%> Him, they <S%G1562>took<s%> His <S%G5511>robe<s%> <S%G1562>off<s%> and <S%G1746>put<s%> His <S%G2440>garments<s%> on Him, and <S%G520>led<s%> Him <S%G520>away<s%> to <S%G4717>crucify<s%> [Him.]

And as they were <S%G1831>coming<s%> out, they <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G3778>whom<s%> they <S%G29>pressed<s%> into <S%G29>service<s%> to <S%G142>bear<s%> His <S%G4716>cross.<s%>
And when they had <S%G2064>come<s%> to a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1115>Golgotha,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3004>means<s%> <S%G5117>Place<s%> of a <S%G2898>Skull,<s%>

they <S%G1325>gave<s%> Him <S%G3631>wine<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with <S%G5521>gall;<s%> and after <S%G1089>tasting<s%> [it,] He was <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G4095>drink.<s%>
And when they had <S%G4717>crucified<s%> Him, they <S%G1266>divided<s%> up His <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1266>among<s%> themselves, <S%G906>casting<s%> <S%G2819>lots;<s%>
and <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G2521>down,<s%> they [began] to <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G5083>watch<s%> <S%G5083>over<s%> Him <S%G1563>there.<s%>

And they <S%G2007>put<s%> up <S%G1883>above<s%> His <S%G2776>head<s%> the <S%G156>charge<s%> <S%G156>against<s%> Him which <S%G1125>read,<s%> <S%G3778>"THIS<s%> IS <S%G2424>JESUS<s%> THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>"
At that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3027>robbers<s%> were <S%G4717>crucified<s%> with Him, <S%G1520>one<s%> on the <S%G1188>right<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> on the <S%G2176>left.<s%>
And <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3899>passing<s%> by were <S%G987>hurling<s%> <S%G987>abuse<s%> at Him, <S%G2795>wagging<s%> their <S%G2776>heads,<s%>

and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "You who [are going to] <S%G2647>destroy<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> and <S%G3618>rebuild<s%> it in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself!<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> You are the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G4716>cross.<s%>"

In the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>way<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> along with the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G4245>elders,<s%> were <S%G1702>mocking<s%> [Him,] and <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

"He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others;<s%> He <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1438>Himself.<s%> He is the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel;<s%> let Him <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> and we shall <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him.

"He <S%G3982>trusts<s%> in <S%G2316>God;<s%> let Him <S%G4506>deliver<s%> [Him] <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> He <S%G2309>takes<s%> <S%G2309>pleasure<s%> in Him; for He <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"
And the <S%G3027>robbers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> who had been <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with Him were <S%G3679>casting<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3679>insult<s%> at Him.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> from the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1096>fell<s%> upon <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G7067>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G7067>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G310>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2241>"Eli,<s%> <S%G2241>Eli,<s%> <S%G2982>lama<s%> <S%G4518>sabachthani<s%>?" that is, "My <S%G2316>God,<s%> My <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2444>why<s%> hast Thou <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> Me?"

And <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, [began] <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> is <S%G5455>calling<s%> for <S%G2243>Elijah.<s%>"

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them <S%G5143>ran,<s%> and <S%G2983>taking<s%> a <S%G4699>sponge,<s%> he <S%G4092>filled<s%> it with <S%G3690>sour<s%> <S%G3690>wine,<s%> and <S%G4060>put<s%> it on a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> and <S%G4222>gave<s%> Him a <S%G4222>drink.<s%>
But the <S%G3062>rest<s%> [of them] <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G863>"Let<s%> us <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> Him."
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> out <S%G3825>again<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and <S%G863>yielded<s%> up [His] <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G2665>veil<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>torn<s%> in <S%G1417>two<s%> from <S%G509>top<s%> to <S%G2736>bottom,<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G4579>shook;<s%> and the <S%G4073>rocks<s%> were <S%G4977>split,<s%>
and the <S%G3419>tombs<s%> were <S%G455>opened;<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> who had <S%G2837>fallen<s%> <S%G2837>asleep<s%> were <S%G1453>raised;<s%>

and <S%G1831>coming<s%> out of the <S%G3419>tombs<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> His <S%G1454>resurrection<s%> they <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> and <S%G1718>appeared<s%> to <S%G4183>many.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1543>centurion,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who were with him <S%G5083>keeping<s%> <S%G5083>guard<s%> <S%G5083>over<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> when they <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G4578>earthquake<s%> and the things that were <S%G1096>happening,<s%> became <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G5399>frightened<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G230>"Truly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> was the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> were <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2334>looking<s%> on from a <S%G3113>distance,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> had <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1247>ministering<s%> to Him,

<S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> was <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> [along with] <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> and the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee.<s%>

And when it was <S%G3798>evening,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> from <S%G707>Arimathea,<s%> <S%G5122>named<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> had <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3100>become<s%> a <S%G3100>disciple<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
